import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Stack, Card, Form, Button, ButtonGroup, ToggleButton } from 'react-bootstrap' function App() { const [given, setGiven] = useState("") const [want, setWant] = useState("") const answerTypes = [ { name: "Pinyin", value: "pinyin" }, { name: "Character", value: "character", }, { name: "Definition", value: "definition" } ] return (
Mandarin Trainer
Given
{answerTypes.map((radio, idx) => ( setGiven(e.currentTarget.value)} > {radio.name} ))}
Test for
{answerTypes.map((radio, idx) => ( setWant(e.currentTarget.value)} > {radio.name} ))} {/* Eric Website yeah you heard that Words here This button has been pressed {count} times the number is {isEven ? 'even' : 'not even'} */}
); } export default App;
